summary: Marinate chicken with spices, onions, garlic, and lime juice. Grill chicken until cooked through. Serve with a side of mixed vegetables, including carrots, peppers, and onions.
Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, and buttermilk.Add eggs and vinegar, then bake.Frost with cream cheese icing.
Mix milk, sugar, and vanilla extract in a saucepan. Add rice, raisins, and nuts. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until the rice is tender and the pudding is set. Serve warm.
Mix flour, salt, sugar, and water to form dough. Roll out dough, fill with spiced mixture, fold, and bake at 375°F for 20 min.
Mix eggs, cheese, milk, and seasonings. Bake in a greased pan at 350°F for 20 min. Cut into squares and serve.
Cook curry paste in coconut milk.Add veggies, protein, and simmer.Finish with fish sauce and basil.
Mix pasta, tomatoes, cheese, and herbs in a bowl. Serve with a fork.
Cook meat with onions and sauce.Layer noodles, ricotta, meat sauce, and mozzarella.Bake at 375Â°F for 45 minutes.
Boil pasta with broccoli; drain.Cook garlic in butter, add cream and cheese.Mix pasta, broccoli, and sauce; serve.
